dataType.name: Interval
dataType.description: Here is 1-, 2-, or 3-D coordinate interval substitution group head element. Such an element needs to contain a minimum or maximum scalar or vector value, or both. It needs to refer to a coordinate system. Boundaries may or may not be inclusive; and it can have a fill factor

dataType.name: resolutionLimits
dataType.description: Hi and Low values of resolution on this axis. Type: stc:coordScalarInterval, or 2Vec or 3Vec

dataType.name: samplingPeriodLimits
dataType.description: Hi and Low values of samplingPeriod on this axis. Type: stc:coordScalarInterval or 2Vec or 3Vec

objectType.name: characterisationAxis
objectType.description: describes an axis and its properties

objectType.name: CoverageType
objectType.description: How the observation is spanned along this axis

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: redefinition of unit for coverage

composition.name: bounds
composition.description: the limits of the observation on this axis

composition.name: support
composition.description: describes the area where measurements are effectively present and interpretable

composition.name: sensitivity
composition.description: encodes the variability of response along the axis

attribute.name: axisName
attribute.description: A name representing the physical nature of the axis like Spatial, Spectral, Time, Velocity or any other free name for an axis

attribute.name: ucd
attribute.description: The physical meaning of the axis, Type: standard semantic tag defined in the UCD list.

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: default unit for the axis: Type: controlled unit vocabulary following the VOTable units definitions

attribute.name: independentAxis
attribute.description: Indicates wether the axis is independent or not from the other axes. The Observable axis has a false independentAxis 'value' Type : boolean

attribute.name: calibrationStatus
attribute.description: defines if and how the axis is calibrated: Possible String values: CALIBRATED, UNCALIBRATED, RELATIVE, NORMALIZED

attribute.name: numBins
attribute.description: Number of bins for this axis. Type : array of 1 2 or 3 integers

attribute.name: undersamplingStatus
attribute.description: A flag to mention wether the data are undersampled. Type: boolean

attribute.name: regularsamplingStatus
attribute.description: A flag to mention wether the data are regularly sampled. Type : boolean

composition.name: coordsystem
composition.description: Reference coordinate system for the axis:

composition.name: ObsyLoc
composition.description: Observatory location Type: a STC:observatoryLocationType or an xlink

composition.name: accuracy
composition.description: Global accuracy description of the axis

objectType.name: SpatialAxisType
objectType.description: Restriction of CharacterisationAxis for Spatial Axis

objectType.name: SpectralAxisType
objectType.description: Restriction of characteristionAxis for Spectral Axis

attribute.name: quality
attribute.description: A combination of flags attesting the data quality. Type: String

attribute.name: flavor
attribute.description: The type of error described : statistical , systematic, global, etc. Type: string

composition.name: ErrorRefVal
composition.description: Typical statistical Error on the axis

composition.name: ErrorBounds
composition.description: Range of the error for mapping along this axis

composition.name: ErrorVariability
composition.description: A detailed description of the local error values

objectType.name: ErrorRefValType
objectType.description: Typical statistical error on the axis. Types: depend on the dimensionality 1D Error based on stc:double1Type 2D Errors based on stc:size2Type, double2Type or double1Type (error 2 radius) 3D Errors based on stc:size3Type, double3TYpe or double1Type (error 3 radius)

objectType.name: ErrorBoundsType
objectType.description: Hi and Low values of statistical errors on this axis. Type: stc:coordScalarInterval, 2DVecInterval or 3DVecInterval

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: A description of the error extreme values . Type: any URI type

objectType.name: ErrorVariabilityType
objectType.description: A detailed description of the local error values. Could be conveyed with the data as in IVOA Spectrum data model Type: any URI type pointing to such a map

attribute.name: ErrorMap
attribute.description: A map showing the variability of the error Type: any URI type

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: documentation on the Error variation Type: any URI type

objectType.name: LocationType
objectType.description: The typical coordinate value Type: stc:astroCoordsType

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: Redefinition of unit

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: The typical coordinate value Type: stc:astroCoordsType

attribute.name: unit
attribute.description: for bounds unit redefinition

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: A document to mention how the bounds are defined.

composition.name: limits
composition.description: The actual values defining the bounds. 2 possible types : a characterisation:CharBox which is a customised STC:Coordinate with mandatory value and size or an STC:Interval

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Some text about the Support region definition Type: any URI type

attribute.name: variationMap
attribute.description: encodes the variability of the response along the axis

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: documents the purpose, type and encoding of sensitivity information Type: URL

objectType.name: CharCoordinateType
objectType.description: A coordinate type to define n-D bounding boxes. To be overridden by any of the following possible substitution elements.

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Defines and explains how this reference value for resolution has been estimated Type: URL

objectType.name: ReferenceValue
objectType.description: Typical resolution value along the axis 1D resolution of type stc:double1Type 2D resolution of type stc:size2Type, double4Type or double1Type (resolution radius) 3D resolution of type stc:size3Type, double9TYpe or double1Type (resolution 3 radius)

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Explains how the fill factor is estimated . Type: URI

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Explains how the fill factor is estimated . Type: URI

objectType.name: samplingPeriod
objectType.description: Typical sampling Period value of the axis Type : depends on the dimensionality 1D samplingPeriod based on stc:double1Type 2D samplingPeriod based on stc:size2Type, double4Type or double1Type ( sampling period radius) 3D samplingPeriod based on stc:size3Type or double9TYpe or double1Type (sampling period 3 radius)

objectType.name: sampleExtent
objectType.description: Typical sample Extent value of the axis 'Types : depend on the dimensionality' 1D sampleExtent based on stc:double1Type 2D sampleExtent based on stc:size2Type, double4Type or double1Type (sampling extent radius) 3D sampleExtent based on stc:size3Type, double9TYpe or double1Type (sampling extent 3 radius)

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Defines and explains how this resolution has been estimated

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: Defines and explains how this resolution has been estimated Type: URL

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: A place to hook some explanations about 'how' the Sampling was done and assessed. Type: URI

objectType.name: ResolutionVariabilityType
objectType.description: This map describes the variability of the resolution along the axis, the varying shape of the point spread fonction, or both. Can be attached to the data Type: URI

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.description: defines and explains how this resolution has been estimated Type: URL

attribute.name: samplingPrecisionMap
attribute.description: This map describes the variability of the sampling along the axis, or the varying shape of the sampling fonction, or both. Can be attached to the data implemented as anyURI type

package.name: stcExtra
package.description: some definitions that have not got into STC 2.0
